author: Reuters Editorial
title: Hannover Re sees 2018 net profit of more than 1 bln euros
text:
FRANKFURT, Feb 7 (Reuters) - Hannover Re said on Wednesday that it was optimistic for 2018 after treaty renewals at the start of the year showed a stabilization in prices and forecast full-year net profit of more than 1 billion euros ($1.24 billion).
The German reinsurer anticipates its net profit for this year will come to 950 million euros, lower than the previous year after a spate of natural disasters.
$1 = 0.8074 euros Reporting by Tom Sims; Editing by Maria Sheahan
